member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions
member.summary: Represents the configuration options for a TCP client. Provides properties to configure various TCP settings such as dual mode, keep-alive, buffer sizes, and more.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.DualMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TCP client operates in dual mode (IPv4/IPv6).

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.KeepAlive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether TCP keep-alive is enabled for the connection.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.TcpKeepAliveTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration, in seconds, before the first keep-alive packet is sent. This property is only applicable in .NET Core. A value of -1 indicates the default system setting.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.TcpKeepAliveInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval, in seconds, between subsequent keep-alive packets if no acknowledgment is received. This property is only applicable in .NET Core. A value of -1 indicates the default system setting.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.TcpKeepAliveRetryCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of keep-alive probes that will be sent before dropping the connection. This property is only applicable in .NET Core. A value of -1 indicates the default system setting.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.NoDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TCP NoDelay option is enabled, which disables the Nagle algorithm.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.ReceiveBufferLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the receive buffer. A value of 0 indicates no limit.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.ReceiveBufferCapacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial capacity, in bytes, of the receive buffer. Default value is 8192 bytes.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.SendBufferLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the send buffer. A value of 0 indicates no limit.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.TcpClientOptions.SendBufferCapacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial capacity, in bytes, of the send buffer. Default value is 8192 bytes.

member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions
member.summary: Represents the configuration options for a UDP client. Provides properties to configure various UDP settings such as dual mode, address reuse, multicast, buffer sizes, and more.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions.DualMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the UDP client operates in dual mode (IPv4/IPv6).

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions.ReuseAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the UDP socket can be bound to an address that is already in use.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions.ExclusiveAddressUse
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the UDP socket should use an exclusive address.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions.Multicast
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multicast is enabled for the UDP client.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions.ReceiveBufferLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the receive buffer. A value of 0 indicates no limit.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions.ReceiveBufferCapacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial capacity, in bytes, of the receive buffer. Default value is 8192 bytes.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions.SendBufferLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the send buffer. A value of 0 indicates no limit.

member.name: P:XmobiTea.ProtonNetClient.Options.UdpClientOptions.SendBufferCapacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial capacity, in bytes, of the send buffer. Default value is 8192 bytes.
